subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The New York Racing Association said it was facing a cash crunch that could threaten the Belmont Stakes because the state government had not approved video slot machines at Aqueduct racetrack.
snippet: The New York Racing Association said it was facing a cash crunch that could threaten the Belmont Stakes because the state government had not approved video slot machines at Aqueduct racetrack.
